patthana15.19:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.19:0.3_0: Standing on the past, the foot of the past.
patthana15.19:1.1_0: Because of the past, the support that arises dependent on the thought that arises.
patthana15.19:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.19:2.1_0: Because of the future, the support is not the basis for the happiness that gives rise to diversity of Dhamma.
patthana15.19:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.19:3.1_0: Because of the present, the support is not for the sake of seeing.
patthana15.19:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
